item.title: Git
item.description: Configs: Priority lowest to highest -> system wide (–system) -> user specific (–global) -> repo specific (–local) git config --list Help: --help // open in new tab full man page help // open in new tab full man page -h // show in terminal git help -a // list all commands Adding to staging: git add <file> git add -A git add . git add -u git add -p Check staging:
